text: Alireza Zarrindast (; born 1945 in Tabriz, Iran) is an Iranian Cinematographer. He is the brother of Tony Zarrindast. ==Notes== ==External links== * * Alireza Zarrindast in Internet database of Soureh Cinema Category:Living people Category:People from Tabriz Category:1945 births Category:Iranian cinematographers
title: Alireza Zarrindast
